statements: SELECT * FROM notifications;
SELECT notification_id, notification_text, is_read FROM notifications WHERE user_id = '123456';
SELECT notification_id, notification_text FROM notifications WHERE is_read = FALSE ORDER BY notification_time DESC;
SELECT notification_id, notification_text FROM notifications WHERE notification_id = '789012345';
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE user_id = '987654' AND is_read = TRUE ORDER BY notification_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE is_read = FALSE ORDER BY notification_time DESC;
SELECT notification_text, user_id FROM notifications WHERE notification_time > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY notification_time LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT notification_id, notification_text FROM notifications WHERE user_id = '87654321-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND is_read = TRUE;
SELECT notification_text, notification_time FROM notifications WHERE user_id = 'abcd1234-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY notification_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM notifications
SELECT message, timestamp FROM notifications WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT notification_id, user_id, message FROM notifications WHERE notification_id = 3
SELECT * FROM alerts ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT alert_type, alert_message FROM alerts WHERE user_id = 2
SELECT notification_id, message, timestamp FROM notifications WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT alert_id, alert_type, alert_message FROM alerts WHERE user_id IN (10, 20, 30) ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM notifications INNER JOIN alerts ON notifications.user_id = alerts.user_id WHERE notifications.message LIKE '%urgent%' AND alerts.alert_type = 'error';
SELECT notification_id, message, timestamp FROM notifications WHERE user_id = 50 AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT alert_id, alert_type, alert_message, created_at FROM alerts WHERE alert_type IN ('warning', 'critical') ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM file_notifications;
SELECT notification_id, file_name, user_id FROM file_notifications WHERE notification_type = 'success';
SELECT notification_id, file_name, timestamp FROM file_notifications ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_subscriptions WHERE subscription_status = 'active';
SELECT user_id, subscription_id, subscription_type FROM user_subscriptions WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT log_id, alert_message, timestamp FROM alert_logs ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM file_notifications ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, file_name FROM file_notifications WHERE notification_type = 'error';
SELECT notification_id, user_id, file_name, notification_type, timestamp FROM file_notifications WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM user_subscriptions WHERE subscription_status = 'active';
SELECT user_id, subscription_type FROM user_subscriptions WHERE user_id = 98765 ORDER BY subscription_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Notifications;
SELECT message, timestamp FROM Notifications WHERE user_id = '123456';
SELECT user_id, message FROM Notifications WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Notifications ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT notification_id, message FROM Notifications WHERE user_id = '789123' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM Notifications ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, message FROM Notifications WHERE user_id = 'abc123' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, message, timestamp FROM Notifications JOIN Users ON Notifications.user_id = Users.user_id WHERE Users.username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM Files WHERE file_size > 1000 ORDER BY upload_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, alert_message FROM Alerts WHERE alert_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY alert_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM notifications;
SELECT message, user_id FROM notifications WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT notification_id, message, timestamp FROM notifications ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Critical' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%john%' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT message FROM notifications JOIN users ON notifications.user_id = users.user_id WHERE username = 'john_doe'
SELECT alert_message FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'urgent' LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM files WHERE file_size > 1000 ORDER BY file_id ASC
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%'
